node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `softlink_creation` ( `softlink_creation_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `creater_user_id` int NOT NULL, `to_node` int NOT NULL, `from_node` int NOT NULL, `displayed` tinyint DEFAULT '0', `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`softlink_creation_id`), KEY `creater_user_id__to_node__displayed` (`creater_user_id`,`to_node`,`displayed`), KEY `creater_user_id__create_time` (`creater_user_id`,`create_time`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: softlink_creation
